subject: Baseball
Colleges and Universities
lead_paragraph: Mitch Harris, a 29-year-old rookie who made his debut two weeks ago and earned his first victory Tuesday, is the first Naval Academy graduate in the majors since 1921.
snippet: Mitch Harris, a 29-year-old rookie who made his debut two weeks ago and earned his first victory Tuesday, is the first Naval Academy graduate in the majors since 1921.
